column1: PERCENTAGE OF SHAREHOLDING IN PUBLIC’S HANDS
BASED  ON  THE  INFORMATION  MADE  AVAILABLE  TO  THE  COMPANY  AS  AT  15  MARCH  2019,  APPROXIMATELY  23.42%  OF  THE
COMPANY’S ISSUED SHARES (EXCLUDING TREASURY SHARES AND SUBSIDIARY HOLDINGS) WERE HELD IN THE HANDS OF PUBLIC.
ACCORDINGLY, THE COMPANY HAS COMPLIED WITH RULE 723 OF THE LISTING MANUAL OF THE SINGAPORE EXCHANGE SECURITIES
